    Hello! I am Sloke.

    Hello. I am a masters student at UT Austin in the Chandra Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering. I currently work at the Human Signals Lab as a Graduate Research Assistant. I have been working on machine learning based projects for 4+ years and I am passionate about developing reliable systems for machine learning. Before UT, I worked in a research lab at UT Tyler where I helped a startup, RAE Health, build machine learning models and data pipelines for a wearable health framework. I am actively looking for internship and co-op opportunities and am entering the job market for a full time position in Fall 2024.
